sourcesContent: import { Component, Input, OnChanges, SimpleChanges } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-document-viewer', templateUrl: './document-viewer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./document-viewer.component.css'] }) export class DocumentViewerComponent implements OnChanges { @Input() documentContent: string = ''; @Input() selectedLabel: string | null = null; labelColorMap: { [key: string]: string } = { SKILLS: 'blue', EXPERIENCE: 'green', DIPLOMA: 'purple', DIPLOMA_MAJOR: 'red' }; annotatedDocumentContent: string = ''; ngOnChanges(changes: SimpleChanges) { if (changes['documentContent']) { this.annotatedDocumentContent = changes['documentContent'].currentValue; } } }
